Rose Park Farmers Market Every Wednesday

Join your neighbors at Rose Park Farmers Market on Wednesdays from 3:00 pm to 7:00 pm at 26th & O Streets in Georgetown for fresh produce, artisan bread, fresh Maine lobster, and more.

It’s Time To Feel Great Again

Ice Cream Anyone? DC Enters Phase Two

As we begin to venture out during Phase Two, please remember to wear a mask and keep a safe distance. Local restaurants and shops are opening their doors to welcome us back. Please support your favorite businesses now!

'Brag Better'

Brooke Pinto Won the Primary Election. Now, We Must Elect Her on Tuesday.

She was the eighth candidate to enter the race, giving her the least amount of time to build a political name and recognition. She was outspent hundreds of thousands of dollars by other candidates and outside Super PAC money.

Saying ‘All Lives Matter’ is Wrong

There are still some who find it necessary to say ‘All Lives Matter’ when others chant ‘Black Lives Matter’. The problem is when talking about ‘all lives’ people are missing the point of what is and has been going on in our country from its founding.

I Commit

DC Phase One Reopening May 29th

D.C. Mayor Bowser announced an executive order that will go into effect on Friday, May 29 that will place the District in phase one.

With this new order in the District non-essential businesses will be allowed to operate with curb-side or front door pickups, according to Bowser.
